fixes.name: Performance Code
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Is High Performing ] = "Yes", 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Quality Score ] + 2, 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Quality Score ] - 1)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF and mapped column references to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Column]. This is a row-level transformation (no aggregations or parameters), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
